summary: The impact of a selfless deed of benevolence and heroism right in the middle of the raging Bosnian war inextricably intertwines the lives of five people who are still affected by its consequences, over a decade later.
cast: Aleksandar Bercek|Dejan Cukic|Leon Lucev|Nebojsa Glogovac|Geno Lechner|Nikola Rakocevic|Hristina Popovic|Raslav Sekulovic|Emir Hadzihafizbegovic|Sara Dao Hameder|Vuk Kostic|Franziska Neiding|Marko Janketic|Jasna Djuricic|Igor Borojevic|Igor Damnjanovic|Radoje Cupic|Boris Isakovic|Ivana Scepanovic
title: Krugovi
